trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Hesperia
There was one other sighting in Hesperia on or around September 19th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was looking outside in our back yard to see the stars , I seen this object in the distance with a glowing light . I run inside to get my viedo Recorder, I called my husband to look at this light , it started to get small then big , going from side to side , up & down . I zoom it in when the object would get bigger , that's when I noticed the pulsing lights under the object .we keep asking each other "what's that" . After a while I just could not believe what I just got on film , The object just disappeared And I have it on video .. I still am unsure of what this is but I know it something
